comments: Biyombo (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Young (ATL) firms up and absorbs the contact.
Collins (ATL) establishes his screening position in Martin's (CHA) path and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Martin (CHA) places his hands momentarily to Reddish's (ATL) back and removes them.
Collins (ATL) is exiting the lane within the three seconds.
Collins (ATL) makes marginal contact to Biyombo's (CHA) back as he receives the pass.
Huerter (ATL) and Biyombo (CHA) simultaneously make contact with the ball in pursuit of the rebound, the contact made to hand after the ball is tipped out is marginal.
Hunter (ATL) makes contact to the arm of Biyombo (CHA) as he receives the pass.  The contact occurs prior to his upward shooting motion.
Martin (CHA) makes marginal contact to the body of Reddish (ATL) as he gains control of the rebound.
Biyombo (CHA) makes marginal contact with a resting hand on Collins (ATL) back as he receives the pass on the play at the basket.
Reddish (ATL) makes contact to Graham's (CHA) arm and affects his SQBR on the drive to the basket.
Martin (CHA) reaches in and makes contact to the arm of Young (ATL) at the start of the drive.
Biyombo (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Huerter (ATL) firms up and absorbs the contact.
Huerter (ATL) does not make contact to Biyombo's (CHA) arm on the play at tthe basket.
Biyombo (CHA) jumps vertically and maintains a legal vertical position contesting the shot attempt by Collins (ATL).
Collins (ATL) receives the rebound and makes an immediate putback attempt on the play at the basket.  He makes incidental contact to Rozier's (CHA) head as he brings his arm down following the shot.
Huerter (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position on Martin (CHA) during the drive.
Rozier (CHA) does not release the shot prior to the 24 second shot clock violation expiring.
Huerter (ATL) commits a take foul on Zeller (CHA).
Biyombo (CHA) places his hand momentarily to Collins' (ATL) back and slides his hand off.

Replay review of the foul called on Rozier (CHA) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful.  Rozier (CHA) extends his arm backwards and hooks Graham's (ATL) side and affects his ability to defend.
Collins (ATL) makes marginal contact to Graham's (CHA) body as he initiates the contact to Collins' side in transition.
Rozier (CHA) briefly clamps Hunter's (ATL) arm and releases his arm while rebounding.
Martin (CHA) cleanly blocks the Huerter's (ATL) layup attempt.
Collins (ATL) makes marginal contact to the body of Graham (CHA) during the drive.
Collins (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Graham (CHA).
On the pass attempt Graham (CHA) makes contact to the ball and when Hunter (ATL) gains possession of the ball he has gathered on his right foot and takes two legal steps prior to his shot attempt.
Rozier (CHA) gathers the ball on his left foot and takes two legal steps prior to the shot attempt.
After cleanly blocking the ball Martin (CHA) makes incidental contact to the arm of Hunter (ATL) after the release of his shot attempt.
Reddish (ATL) legally contests the shot attempt by Rozier (CHA) and the marginal contact is created when Rozier (CHA) unnaturally extends his leg forward.
Graham (CHA) commits a take foul on Reddish (ATL).
